channel.title: Compiler trouble
channel.description: all my compilers are being fruity, saying i dont have the newest version of java when i actually do, i re downloaded them and yet they insist i dont, i need an awesome compiler, thanks!

item.title: Compiler trouble
item.dc:creator: @chaos_mast93 chaos_mast93
item.description:
@chaos_mast93 wrote:

Hey, i hope I will be able to help you.
You should have a file called “compile&run” or “serverfile”, right click on the file you have and click “Edit”, erase everything and replace it with this, it 100% works.

@echo off title BasilScape Server compile+restaRTer tskill java /a javac *.java java -cp .;./jython.jar server
This file compiles and runs your server.

I hope I helped ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler trouble
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Send us the code of your java, where it says c:/programmefiles ( You know the line )
Change the Jdk6.(Whatever) to the jave you have installed, say your java folder is called jdk6.3, put that in where i told you to remove the (whatever)
